node.html: A project with the aim to foster creativity, collaboration, and human connection in a virtual setting. It applies a transform (e.g. style transfer) to a video stream, allowing both parties to alter their voice & apperance.
A redesign of the original CovEducation website. The updated site has a faster load speed, better UI, and has a better mentor finding UX. Built with ReactJS.
Contributor to SuperGlue - A modular video 'digestion system' and news aggregator. Serves as the foundation for several Media Lab projects.
Optimized the VGG16 network to work better when faced with objects under occlusion. Part of a class project for 6.804 - Computational Cognitive Science.
